ygData.subject: RE: efrium
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry, but that statement is not valid and I have to disagree here...  I ve killed the Executioner many times, and never once has he slashed me unless he
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry, but that statement is not valid and I have
to disagree here... I've killed the Executioner many
times, and never once has he slashed me unless he had
a FS sword loaded. The axe does not appear as a
graphic, nor does he use it when attacking you. My
team has gotten 5 axes (usually from us pulling him
out of boredom while camping out those silly guises)
and he's "hit us" for damage every time the axe is
loaded.

Your statement holds true for MOST mobs, but not for
the Ghoul Executioner.

Gazamel Prime
50th Warrior
Solusek Ro

--- James Agay <jamesa@...> wrote:
> While I think you are correct about the previous
> post being full of crap,
> you can tell what weapon a mob has without there
> being a graphic by reading
> the damage messages, (a kobold pierces you, a kobold
> hits you, a kobold
> slashes you...etc.)
>
>
>
> >
> > From: "Michael McGrath" <pagansmurf23@...>
> >
> > ok, this isn't a bash on anyone, but ready this
> guys posts just makes me
> > laugh, he appears to have all this knowledge about
> tinkering and the pets
> > then the next post he says "charmed the
> executioner cuz he had an
> > axe" ? i
> > dont' think so, first of all you can't charm if
> you have a
> > pet/animation, or
> > ppl could make multiple animations, and secondly
> the ghoul exec has no
> > animation for when he holds the axe. so you
> couldn't possible have seen
> > it...
> >
> > you just lost all your credibility man
> >
> > Daey Faroth
> > 50th Necro
> > Xegony
> >
> > >
>
